name: Echo of Self
description:
Echo of Self is a single player, sudo-cooperative, side scrolling, puzzle-platformer.

A & D = Move left and right
Space = Jump

Your goal is to reach the green doors at the end of the level with both player characters without letting the screen catch up to you, or falling of the stage.

Developer notes:
- A game made for GGJ 2022, with the theme duality
- The character might get stuck, just let the camera catch up to you or jump of the stage with the other player-character if that happens.
- As of now I’m interested in working on this in the future, so any feedback is much appreciated.
- This game might be challenging for some players, and ideally I would’ve built up the difficulty over time for a more user-friendly experience.
